DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effects Nebivolol Carvedilol Diastolic Function Elderly Heart Failure Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This trial prospective , randomize , open-label , active control study design investigate effect nebivolol carvedilol diastolic function leave ventricle ( LV ) elderly HF patient preserve EF . Patients include study LVEF ≥ 40 % , NYHA functional class I , II III , clinical stability without hospital admission HF precede 3 month .
